definition: lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Mr. Rochon married his childhood sweetheart Annick 43 years ago.thecouple
sentences.chinese: 罗雄先生43年前娶了他青梅竹马的恋人安妮克。

sentences.english: They were neighbors, a boy and a girl.
sentences.chinese: 他们是邻居，男孩和女孩，青梅竹马。
我们过去在高中里青梅竹马。

sentences.english: Wen and Xuan are pigs. They have known each other and been in love since they were little.
sentences.chinese: 宣和纹是两只彼此深爱着的猪，从小青梅竹马。

sentences.english: Torres and Olalla, who is currently 7-months pregnant, were childhood lovers.
sentences.chinese: 托雷斯与怀有7月身孕的奥拉拉是青梅竹马。

sentences.english: The prince is going to a soldier, dont give up his childhood sweetheart lover core.
sentences.chinese: 王子尚要去当兵，不舍他的青梅竹马的恋人子芯。

sentences.english: He is engaged to his childhood sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 他与他青梅竹马的情人订婚了。

sentences.english: Did your character have any childhood friends?
sentences.chinese: 你的角色有没有青梅竹马的朋友？

sentences.english: I married Shurla, my childhood sweetheart, in Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 我在利物浦和我青梅竹马的恋人舒拉结婚了。

sentences.english: In he and the village the young pretty Guo in eleventh lunar month friends from childhood, the sincerity falls in love.
sentences.chinese: 他和村里年轻貌美的郭冬月青梅竹马，真心相爱。

sentences.english: Yumiko marries Ikuo, a childhood friend, and gives birth to a young son.
sentences.chinese: 由美子嫁给了青梅竹马的朋友郁夫，两人生了个儿子。

sentences.english: We were brought up together; there was not quite a year difference in our ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩是青梅竹马一块长大的，年纪相差还不到一岁。

definition: to make a pledge to be married, without parents' approval
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to be secretly in love with
bamboo stick used as a toy horse
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
as close as one's hands and feet (idiom); loving one another as brothers/deep friendship/closely attached to one another
see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
